message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with human action recognition using infrared and visible light data, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed method involves transfer learning and feature alignment, which are common techniques in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions the use of support vector machines (SVM), which is a popular classification algorithm in multimedia (cs.MM) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
